item.description:
And so it seems a lot of people preferred to start climbing a little bit earlier so that they can get home and prepare for the next day. As a result, we're bumping up the Monday Night Meetup's to 7 pm.




Because Rock Spot Climbing is our sponsor, we are fortunate enough for them to offer a discounted rate to Meetup members! Be sure to say thank you and let them know when arriving that you are with the Meetup Group!

Cost: $10 (own gear) or $15 (gear & lesson)


The address says Boston, but it's more like Hyde Park/Dedham area. Plenty of parking for those who drive.

Click Here for Directions!

If you're new and want to learn, please be sure to schedule a belay lesson at least 24 hours in advance with Rock Spot directly to ensure proper staffing on Monday evening.

All climbers will need to fill out a waiver and pass a belay test upon initial visit.

Please let me know if you have any questions. Feel free to use this wall for carpooling, pre-/post-dinner plans, etc. etc. etc.
item.name: Return of the Rock!
